name: Cable Cozy
description:
A lovingly hand knit cozy for your favorite wide mouth jar! The cable cozy features a cable motif on both the front and back of the cozy.

These cozies slip on your jar to insulate and protect your fingers from your favorite hot beverage. Rather than a simple sleeve, these cozies have a bottom that works as a coaster!

Cozies are approximately 4 inches high from the base (this measurement does not include the bottom/coaster). Photos show cozies on wide mouth pint jars. Every cozy has been knit by me in wool. To clean, simply rinse and lay flat on a towel to dry.

Price includes shipping in the United States. I am happy to ship internationally. If you do not see the shipping price for your country below, please contact me!
